description.zh: 本堂課主要在於從全球化與在地化的角度探討當代建築與都市設計中的重要理論、案例與關鍵課題，尤其藉由回溯其自二十世紀初以來的發展歷史，本課程將聚焦於一系列具有代表性的建築師與設計作品，透過他們在建築與都市設計上的專業實踐來反思當代人類社會所面臨的各種挑戰與機會。具體本課程將透過案例討論與分析的方式來進行，所有學生將對於指定案例進行獨立研究，並應用課堂所教授之方法與工具對於該案例進行理論與空間構成的分析性評論，最終再彙整成一份完整的評述報告。案例分析的內容將需要包括以下四個重點：一、時空背景如何對於建築與都市設計之實踐造成影響？二、空間生產的過程與結果如何回應真實社會的需求？三、如何從空間構成的角度反思設計之於空間的意義與價值？四、該案例如何影響未來建築與都市設計之發展趨勢？在分析工具的部分，本課程針對建築與都市設計兩種不同的尺度將分別著重於兩種不同面向的分析：在建築尺度的案例上主要的重點在於空間的組織性，實際操作則是以距離、深度與視野等不同元素的比較分析為主；在都市設計尺度的案例上重點則在於空間的序列性，透過軸線、區段與使用分析對於都市型態的轉變與演化提出反思。
description.en: The course aims to analyze contemporary ideas, ideologies, and projects of architecture and urban design in the context of both globalization and specific local contexts. By tracing the development back to the early 20th century, the work and thinking of influential architects will be examined in terms of their reflection on current challenges in our profession and society. The main content of this course will be delivered through case study. In specific, all students are expected to make analytic comments on assigned cases by applying tools taught in class. Four interrelated issues are to be focused: 1. Context of professional practice; 2. Production of space in relation to social demands; 3. Reflection on spatial configuration; and 4. Influence on future trends.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

notes: 日職建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 施工歷史可以被視為了解建築理論的關鍵基礎。按照慣例，建築學院提供建築歷史方面的研究方面，包括建築風格和哲學的發展，或者建築材料和建築技術的最新進展。此外，關於建築的理論辯論也更加關注哲學的討論，而不是物理建築的表現。但是，建築理論主要討論材料和建築系統的表示。因此，材料的構造方法實際上會極大地影響建築理論的解釋。因此，該課程可以分為兩個部分：首先，將回顧東西方世界的建設歷史以及現代時期。其次，將討論結構論和相對論的爭論。本課程的目的是發展與會學生的能力，使他們能夠回顧自己論點的要點，並運用適當的理論來支持或爭論他們對建築理論的理解。
description.en: Construction history could be considered as the key foundation to understand architectonic theories. Conventionally, architectural academies provide study aspects either in architectural histories in terms of development of architectural style and philosophy or in the latest progress of architectural materials and construction techniques. Moreover, theoretical debates of architecture also pay more attentions to philosophical discussions instead of physical construction presentation.Nevertheless, architectonic theories mainly discuss the presentation of materials and construction systems. Therefore, construction methods of materials in fact affect the interpretation of architectonic theories significantly. As a result, this course can be divided into two sections: firstly the construction history of Eastern and Western worlds as well as modern period of time will be reviewed. Secondly the architectonic and relative theoretic debates will be discussed. The purpose of the course is to d

description.zh: 本課程將介紹國內外的房屋生產系統和裝修技術案例。該課程將在以下主題中進行。A.規劃審查施工生產的總體方向，包括施工合同，項目預算，生命週期，  風險管理和資金分配方法。B.設計物流和裝貨的程度，施工方法。 設計系統，建築設計智能，建築材  料和性能。 建築生產對社會的影響。C.施工現場調查，施工計劃，施工前時間表，施工管理，方法及其演變。D.裝修建築拆除或裝修的評估標準，裝修計劃，設計，項目，法令和系統。E.拆除：建築拆除的機械和方法，以及建築廢料的再利用。
description.en: This course will introduce the domestic and foreign housing production system and renovation technology cases.The course will be conducted in the following topics.A.	Planning A review of the overall direction of construction production, including construction contract, project budget,life cycle, risk management and method of fund dispatch.B.	Design The degree of logistics and loading, construction method. Design system, building design intelligence,building materials and performance. The influence of construction production to society.C.	Construction The site investigation, construction plan, time schedule before construction, construction management,methods and their evolutions.D.	Renovation The assessment criteria of building demolition or renovation, the renovation plan, design, project, decree and system.E.	Demolition：The building demolition machinery and methods, and the reuse of building waste materials.

description.zh: 因應高齡化社會的來臨，本課程探討高齡者的健康、住家、行動力、通訊、休閒和工作等議題，以使用者為中心發掘問題，提出改善高齡者生活之產品、環境或服務設計，以達到在地安養的目的。
description.en: To cope with the coming of the aging society, issues about health, housing, mobility, communication, leisure and work for senior citizens are discussed in the class.  User-centred approaches are adopted to explore the difficulties the senior citizens encountered in their daily life.  Product, environment of services designs are proposed to improve the living quality for the senior citizens.  Hopefully, the concept of aging in place will be realized.

notes: ◎創新所與設計博合開；英語授課

description.zh: Brundtland報告在1987年將永續發展定義為「在不損害後代子孫滿足其自身需求的能力的前提下滿足當前需求的發展。」17個永續發展目標依循千禧年共同訂定發展目標的成功基礎上延展，其中包括諸如氣候變化，經濟不平等，創新，可持續消費，和平與正義等新領域。17個永續發展目標更於2016年1月成為聯合國致力發展推動政策及生效直至2030年。本課程旨在探討研究「永續發展」新概念和理論基礎。課程論述著重於工業化國家（尤其是台灣地區）的永續性問題，例如人口老齡化，可持續消費等。課程中透過創新產品設計與開發方法來系統化引導學生探索有關可持續性，經濟和技術層面以及相關知識社會學，並嘗試帶領學生提出具可行性的新產品、系統及服務概念，為當前狀態下提供更好的友善環境解決方案。課程期待學生透過修習該課程，應可以掌握跨學科永續發展的設計原理，並教導如何藉由創新產品設計和開發方法來引導不同永續相關背景和設計背景的專業人員合作以瞭解開發市場上成功之環境友善產品之關鍵課題，針對環境需求，提出創新友善環境解決方案並進而產生創新環境友善產品。
description.en: Sustainable development is defined by Brundtland Report (1987) as “development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.” There are 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) build on the successes of the Millennium Development Goals, while including new areas such as climate change, economic inequality, innovation, sustainable consumption, peace and justice, among other priorities. The 17 SDGs came into effect in January 2016, and they will continue to guide UNDP policy and funding until 2030. This course aims to explore alternative conceptions and theoretical underpinnings of the notion of “sustainable development.” It focuses on the sustainability problems of industrial countries, especially in Taiwan such as aging of populations, sustainable consumption, etc. It intends to use IPDD approach systematically to explore the sociology of knowledge around sustainability, the economic and technological dimensions a

notes: ◎創新所、互動所(含外生班)與設計博合開

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1.介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2.訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3.熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: * 排光華409,日碩&外碩班合開,預選上限10人

description.zh: 數據資料獲得，主要是依據3S(GPS、GIS、RS)，整合地理資訊系統(GIS)、遙感探測(RS)、以及地面或無人航空載具等多尺度遙感探測之發展，三類資料的綜整為重要的學習議題。地物在時間及空間分佈之規律性，則可以在分佈潛勢地區，判釋分析。空間資料之建立成果，後續除了展示圖與視覺化分析之外，更應進一步進行空間統計、空間層級、空間分布型態、空間自相關、空間關係與模式等相關技術之研究與發展。
description.en: Big data acquisition in environmental space information is mainly based on 3S (GPS, GIS, RS), and the development of multi-scale remote sensing such as ground or unmanned aerial vehicle, i.e. a drone. The consolidation of the different types of data is an important learning issue. The regularity of the distribution of land features in time/space can be interpreted and analyzed by areas/(sequences) of potential distribution. In addition to the display of maps and visualization analysis, the subsequent establishments of spatial data (and relationships among) should further studied with spatial statistics, spatial hierarchy, spatial distribution patterns, spatial inter-correlation, spatial relationships and patterns, and other related technologies.

notes: 排設計701,日碩班和設計博班合開,上限10人

description.zh: 使用者導向之設計已成為大多數互動設計的依循主軸。他翻轉了以產品為導向的傳統，強調以使用者的偏好引領設計的價值。而這就是設計思考的方法導入互動設計中，利用其敏感性和方法，透過可行及可用的技術滿足使用者的需求，從而產生使用者價值並發展市場機會。研究建議，由世界級的設計公司IDEO所主導，設計思考與決策科學相結合，觸發了同理心設計與工程技術的融合。這不僅可以確保提出兼容實際性和創造性地問題解決方案外，而且在設計的開始便融入使用者導向的設計概念，將有助於創新設計與解決方案的提出。同時，在設計的初始階段導入資料應用與分析的方法，更能在設計中正確的整合敏感性，技術可行性，商轉可行性和使用者的需求。本課程主要的概念在於利用設計思考以使用者導向之設計方法，將使用者及其需求作為設計提案以及解決方案的啟始點，並整合分析設計對象，使用者所遭遇的問題，以及如何提高性能以及實現可擴展性等問題。並透過資料科學與工具的整合應用，導引資料分析人員與設計專業人員進行跨領域的整合，以建構未來設計創新的機會與願景。因此，本課程的主要目標是：1.建構以用戶為導向之人本設計重要設計流程。2.使用高品質的數據，可以創建設計工件，
description.en: As the user-center design is becoming the core of most interaction design (IxD), it has become a popular belief that it is no longer the product that leads but users and user preferences that's leading the game. This is where design thinking steps in, where IxD uses their sensibility and methods to match users' need in a way that is technologically feasible and viable enough to generate user value and tap market opportunity. Suggested by some studies, brought in vogue by the popular design firm IDEO, design thinking when combined with decision science results in an infusion of empathy with engineering. This not only ensures a practical and creative resolution of problems but also puts the user at the center of applications and at the starting point to develop new designs and solutions. description.zh: 本課程將討論凝固組織之控制因子，平衡及非平衡狀態下金屬凝固現象，凝固界面之溶質分佈，單晶成長技術，凝固之過冷界面穩定理論，共晶型組織之成長，凝固之熱流分析，凝固之成核成長及粗性及均質處，理凝固理論之應用及鑄造工程簡介。
description.en: The subject area covers the following topics: Control variable of solidification structure and its application; Single crystal growths from the melt and solid; Heat flow in single crystal growth; Solute distribution in solidification, various cases will be treated in detail; Constitutional undercooling and interface stability; Solidification of castings and ingots; Lamellar eutectic growth; Nucleation growth and coarsening; Foundry engineering; Defects analysis in cast construction.

Traditional architecture of Taiwan in Special Topics

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述計畫於都市發展過程的干預以及維護環境永續發展之分派與管理角色，其內容包括：    一、 規劃、規劃師與計畫    二、 1800年到1900年的都市發展    三、 都市計畫的先驅著    四、 戰後規劃的開創    五、 國土與區域計畫    六、 都市與都市區域計畫    七、 歐美的都市計畫    八、 未來聚落的都市規劃
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the role of planning as a form of intervention in the development process, and introduce the role of planning in the allocation and management of a sustainable environment. Thus the course including:    1. Planning, planners and plans    2. The origins: urban growth from 1800 to 1940    3. The seers: pioneer thinkers in urban planning, from        1880 to 1945    4. The creation of the postwar planning machine, from        1940 to 1952    5. National/regional planning from 1945 to 1990    6. Planning for cities and city regions from 1945 to        1990    7. Planning in Western Europe, United States since 1945    8. Settlements into the 21st century

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.zh: 嵌入式系統目前愈來愈普遍。它將會大大地影響我們的生活方式。可攜式裝置如智慧型手機、掌上型電腦、以及所謂的IA裝置如家用網路閘道器、數位視訊錄影機、和常見的遊戲機都是屬於嵌入式系統的範疇。	在本課程中,我們將會討論何謂嵌入式系統、嵌入式系統的形式、以及如何建構一個嵌入式系統。由於嵌入式系統包含硬體及軟體的議題，我們也會探討相關的主題。	本課程的先修課程包含計算機組織與結構、C程式語言、資料結構、系統程式、以及作業系統。課程主要內容如下： 	嵌入式系統簡介與概論 	嵌入式精簡指令集結構 	ARM指令集 	嵌入式計算平台 	嵌入式程式設計與分析 	嵌入式作業系統 	系統設計技術 	裝置操作 	網路本課程亦包含實習與學期專題作業。
description.en: Embedded systems are more and more popular today. It will affect the human life greatly. Portable devices like smart phone, PDA, and MP3 player, and so-called IA devices such as home gateway, DVR, and game machine are all categorized as embedded systems.	In this course, we will discuss what an embedded system is, what it looks like, and how to build an embedded device. Since an embedded system involves hardware and software issues, we will discuss the related subjects. 	The prerequisite courses for this class include computer organization and architecture, the C programming language, data structure, system programming, and operating system. The major topics of this course are listed as follows: 	Introduction and Basic Concepts 	The RISC Embedded Architectures 	The ARM instruction Set 	The Embedded Computing Platforms 	Program Design and Analysis 	The Embedded Operating Systems 	System Design Techniques 	Device Manipulation 	NetworksExperimental laboratories and

name.en: The innovation and development of vocational education

description.zh: 本課程為在當前人工智慧新科技發展，職業專長變更迅速下，技職教育如何配合科技發展、社會變遷、職業轉變創新，以追求未來的發展，給予清楚的認識及實際創新因應的方案。
description.en: This course overviews critical changes in the vocational education due to the rapid AI technology development. Topics include contemporary and potential challenges arising from social and digital transformation, and future opportunities as well as implications related to vocational education.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含:社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 在本課程中，藉由資料蒐集、活動設計、課堂討論與經驗分享等過程，使學生對學習生產力及其特性有所省思與瞭解，掌握正確有效的學習方法，學習如何主動組合、整理、解釋知識，進而培養推廣該專業領域新知的能力。
description.en: By collecting the information, activity planned, discussion in the lessons and sharing the experiences etc. in order to make the students understand this course and it's characteristic, moreover, exactly know well the effective mothod of learning, studying how to make up automatically, arrangement, explain the knowledge, in the meantime, to train and spread their professional ability in the new territory

description.zh: 校務研究（Institutional Research，以下簡稱IR）可說是針對校務所進行的各項研究，透過資料蒐集、分析、報告，以及教職員行動，以促進高等教育機構的運作與決定。同時IR的發展和大學評鑑的發展脈絡息息相關，最終的目的就是要提升學校辦學品質，促進學校良善發展。本課程主要希望加強同學對IR的了解及發展實作能力。
description.en: Institutional research is a broad category of work done at schools, colleges and universities to inform campus decision-making and planning in areas such as admissions, financial aid, curriculum, enrollment management, staffing, student life, finance, facilities, athletics, and alumni relations. Its mission is to foster a culture of evidence by facilitating the management, analysis, and reporting of institutional data and information in support of planning and decision-making. This curriculum is expected to provide all students understand the theory and practice of IR.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。本課程偏重與大地工程相關之調查、規劃、設計、研究、分析、試驗等相關的案例討論。高等大地工程(一)主要課程單元包括:[1]基礎工程案例、[2]邊坡特性分類、[3]邊坡特性調查、[4]邊坡安定分析、[5]邊坡工程整治、[6]邊坡工程案例等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [I] consist of (1) Case studies of foundation problems, (2) Landslide Types, (3) Investigation of landslide features, (4) Stability analysis of slope, (5) Mitigation of unstable slope, (6) Engineering case studies.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.en: The Symbols and Interpretation in Films

description.zh: 課程旨通過對電影的討論與分析，得以進入隱喻、符號、作者論、窺視／凝視、時間與記憶、聲音、電影現象學等論述的理解，並在過程中，探討電影與社會，乃至於與個體生命之間的意義與議題。
description.en: This course aims to study the theories, analysis methods and discussions over the concerns in film studies, including metaphors, symbols, auteur theory, voyeurism/ gaze, temporality and memory, sound, and film phenomenology. With the tutor-led discussions and screenings, we will explore the significances between the cinema and the society, or the cinema and individuals.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

name.en: An Advanced study on green Building

description.zh: 一、教學目標：1.	學習且體認國內外綠建築、環境共生建築及永續經營建築之課題與本質。研討國內外對其課題之解決方法，並培養研擬課題與本土化規劃設計方法之能力。二、教學內容：1.	綠建築、環境共生建築、永續建築之內涵。2.	研討地球環境、人類生活環境及建築環境之相互關係。3.	研討環境共生與綠建築之本質。4.	研討綠建築與生命週期各階段之環境課題。5.	研討國內外綠建築規劃、設計技術及解決方法。6.	研討綠社區、綠都市之發展規劃。
description.en: 1.	The contect of Green Building, Symbiosis Building and Sustainable Building.2.	Study of relation between globe environment, hurman life environment and architecture environment.3.	The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

description.en: This course comprises four parts. Part one is fundamentals of finite-difference methods. Part 2 is the application of finite-difference methods to the equations of fluid mechanics and heat transfer. Part 3 is finite-volume method. Part 4 is grid generation.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

name.zh: 深度學習應用開發實務

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用Python深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：?車牌與門牌數字辨識?人臉辨識?1000種影像分類?辨識9000種物件  ?自動駕駛模擬?嵌入式深度學習演算法?空虛, 寂寞, 覺得冷? 讓深度學習來幫助你:?遞迴式神經網路(RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人?對抗生成網路(GAN)：用GAN產生自己的夢中情人?深度強化學習(DRL)：訓練AI跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:?Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate?Face Recognition?1000 Image Classification?9000 Object Detection?Autopilot simulation?Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms?Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)?Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)?Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)?Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)?Deep Reinforcement Learning

description.zh: 可穿戴式應用已成了全球科技產業的新寵兒之一。因此，漸漸地，穿戴式裝置已成為人們生活用品的一部分。本課程討論可穿戴式系統導論、無線感測網路導論、生醫資訊模組設計、可穿戴式教學平台之設計、情境感知遠距監控與定位救援手仗之設計、非視覺型之不穩步態偵測分析設計、自行車玩家生醫資訊守護神設計、遠距醫療照護系統設計、與客製化谷歌智慧型眼鏡設計。本課程主要達成跨領域的高度整合應用訓練課程。
description.en: Wearable applications have been become one new darling of the global technology industries. Hence, gradually, the wearable devices have become part of people's daily necessities. This course will discuss the topics of “Introduction of wearable system, Introduction of wireless sensor network, Design of Bio-information module, Design of wearable teaching platform, Design of Context-Aware Tele-monitor and Position-rescue Staff, Detection Analysis and Design for Unstable Gait with Non-vision Base, Bicycler-Player Bio-information Guardian, Design of Tele-Medicine care system, and Design of customized Google Smart-glass”. This course is highly integrated applications to achieve interdisciplinary training.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程為電腦輔助溝通與語言教學的概論性導讀，概述電腦輔助溝通的本質及其於第二語言學習與教學上的應用。本課程將藉由不同的語言學習理論來探究當今電腦輔助溝通工具的設計與應用，進一步分析同步與非同步電腦溝通工具對於語言使用及語言學習之成效。
description.en: This course provides an overview of computer-mediated communication (CMC) and its implications in language education. This course aims to explore theoretical and practical issues associated with CMC technologies and the effects of synchronous and asynchronous CMC technologies on learners’ language use and learning.

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解?水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的96家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解?可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 電腦運算速度的進展，隨著電子產業的快速進步，有很大的突破。因此，應運電腦模擬計算已經成為很多領域重要的工具之一。本課程將討論如何應用現今已有的免費分子模擬軟體，來進行分子設計與進一步了解其分子能階，及光譜預測。除此之外，應用在分子模擬上的分子力學，分子動力學，與量子化學的基本觀念也將一併闡述說明。課程中，除基本理論介紹外，也包含實際的軟體實作。
description.en: The progress of electronic industry accelerates the computer development so that computer simulation becomes one of the important tool in many fields. In this course, we will discuss how to apply the computer to assist the molecular structure design. In order to gain insight into the basic idea of structural design, the fundamental background in molecular mechanics, molecular dynamics, and quantum chemistry will be introduced. A practical software introduction will also be included in the course.

description.zh: 1. 二極體電路分析與設計2. 電晶體電路分析與設計3. FET電路分析與設計4. 放大器頻率響應分析及頻率補償5. 功率放大器分析與設計6. 回授放大器分析與設計7. 差動及運算放大器分析與設計8. 震盪器分析與設計9. 主動濾波器分析與設計

Amplifier Frequency response Analysis and Componstaion6. Power Amplifier Analysis and Design7. Feedback Amplifier Analysis and Design8. Differential and Operational Amplifier Analysis and Design9. Oscillator Analysis and Design10. Active Filter Analysis and Design

description.zh: 本課程介紹系統工程，系統工程專注於處理大型、複雜的專案發展時，所面臨的相關工程發展程序與問題，如何從計畫任務成型、系統設計、實體產出、整合測試、品質保證、系統操作、後勤支援、任務操作與結束等全程的一門跨多學科領域的管理與工程科學。本課程簡介系統工程重要議題，並以典型衛星系統研發作為本課程之應用範例。課程內容包括: 系統基本概念、系統工程基本概念、任務分析、系統需求、功能分析與配置、設計整合、產品獲取(或發展)與系統驗證、品質保證、系統管控、系統工程的實施、衛星系統工程實務。
description.en: The course will introduce systems engineering. Systems engineering normally emphasizes handling the engineering process and problems in the development of large and complicated projects/programs. It involves how the project/ program mission formed, system design, hardware/software components produced, integration and testing, quality assurance, system operations, logistics, mission operations until its decommission. It involves various interdisciplinary sciences and management skill for the engineering knowledge and skill to meet the needs for mission success.  This course will provide the introduction on the systems engineering and provide the typical satellites (mission) systems research and development as the examples for better understanding its wide applications. The courses may cover: fundamental concept of system and systems engineering, mission analysis, system requirements, functional analysis and allocations, design and integration, products procurement/ development and syste

description.zh: 本課程主要針對電力電子與其相關應用進行探討，內容著重於電能轉換技術、現代化科技與新世代產品之結合。課程主題如下: (1)電能處理簡介 (2)基本電力轉換器(3)回授控制器設計(4)太陽能電池特性(5)最大功率追蹤技術(6)電池特性與充放電技術(7)逆變器電路與技術(8)再生能源發電系統(9)電動車驅動系統
description.en: This course focuses on the Power Electronic technologies and related applications. The combination of the electrical energy conversion techniques, modern technologies and next generation products will be included. Main topics of this course are as follows: (1) Introduction of Electrical Energy Processing (2) Basic Power Converters(3) Feedback Controller Design(4) Solar Cell Characteristics (5) Maximum Power Point Tracking(6) Battery Characteristics and Charging/Discharging Technologies(7) Inverter Circuits and Technologies(8) Renewable Energy Generation System(9) Driving System of Electric Vehicles

name.zh: 計算機在電控技術之應用
name.en: Computer Methods for Electrical Control Technology

description.zh: 電控技術在現代工業應用中扮演著不可或缺的角色。因此，本課程的目的在使學生了解電控技術，其內容包括Matlab/Simulink軟體平台介紹、電控系統建模、分析與設計。
description.en: Electrical control technology plays an important role in modern industrial applications. Therefore, the purpose of this course is to introduce the technology to the students. The content includes Matlab/Simulink software platform, and electrical control system modeling, analysis and design.

name.en: Application of Fiber Optical Broadband Network

description.zh: 以光纖取代傳統銅纜，可避免干擾，傳輸品質佳。且傳輸服務不中斷，網路架構簡單。此外高速FTTB線路具有客戶頻寬管理功能，可依客戶需求提供更彈性、更高頻寬(至1Gbps)。FTTB提供高速上網外，可提供企業VPN、都會網路、校園專案及互動式多媒體(MOD)等多樣寬頻服務。
description.en: Using fiber optics to replace coaxial cable, the method could avoid interference and achieve high-quality of transmission as well as no interrupting transmission services and simple network architectures. Besides, high-speed FTTB have management functionality of customer broadband, which can provide requirements of more flexibility and high bandwidth to customers. FTTB could offer Business VPN, Metropolitan Area Network, school project, MOD, and various broadband services...etc.

description.zh: 超快雷射由於其脈衝寬度在皮秒(10-12)之下，它在軍事科技、工業應用、生醫檢測與學術研究所扮演的角色日益重要，本課程將介紹超短脈衝雷射的種類，尤其著重在光纖短脈衝雷產生的原理、脈衝壓縮的技術與超短脈衝寬度與相位量測的技術，此外也將介紹超快雷射的各種應用包括光譜量測、泵-探量測與非線性光學量測等技術。
description.en: Due to relative short pulse below one picosecond, ultrafast lasers have been widely used in various fields including military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kinds of the ultrafast lases, especially on the principle of mode-locked fiber generation, pulse compression technique and the method of the ultrashort pulsewidth measurement as well as phase retrieval.  Various applications of ultrafast laser including fluorescence, pump-probe and nonlinear optical measurement have also been introduced in this course.

name.zh: 新世紀生醫產業創新科技
name.en: Innovative biomedical industries in the new millennium

description.zh: 介紹新興生醫產業的趨勢與其跨領域之特性。課程內容含: 生醫產業簡介, 新世紀人類基因體大計畫, 微生物工程新應用, 新型蛋白質藥劑之開發, 分子醫療診斷之革新, 生醫產業之電腦新科技, 遠距醫療服務新模式, 創新健康管理與保險制度的創新, 生醫產業與科技法律, 生醫產業與社會倫理, 幹細胞新產業, 組織再生新產業, 超級老鼠的誕生, 美美的生醫美容, 抗癌症研究之新科技, 抗傳染疾病之新科技。評分的方式以學生報告為主。
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: The object of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 先修課程：近代光學。   1.基本分析工具介紹(6) 2.基本光學系統---近軸光學(6) 3.光學系統元件介紹(6) 4.像差理論(6) 5.像質評估(6) 6.光學系統設計(6) 7.光學套裝軟體使用(6) 8.光電設計專題(9)
description.en: 1.The tools 2.The basic optical systems 3.Basic optical devices 4.Seidel aberrations  5.Image evaluation 6.The design of optical systems 7.The use of Zemax 8.Project on optical design

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   光學元件、光學系統、精密機械元件、精密機械系統、光機系統之實務設計與個案研究
description.en: Optical elements, optical systems, elements of precision machinery, precision mechanical systems, optical machinery design and case study.

notes: *部份週次整天在工廠加工,光電所和IEECS合開

description.zh: 半導體構裝技術是將積體電路和其它電元件，依設計聯結在一系統中，再以構裝材料將晶片、基座及釘架封包。本課程將介紹陶瓷構裝和高分子構裝、及其相關技術、與工業現況。
description.en: Semiconductor packaging is to allow the chips be incorporated into an individual protective package, mounted with other components in hybrid or multichip modules, or connected directly onto a printed circuit board. This course will introduce both ceramic packaging and polymer packaging and their corresponding technology.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

name.zh: 流行與文化：書籍、影視節目等
name.en: Popular Culture: Books, Movies, TV Shows, and Beyond

description.zh: 電影、電視、漫畫書、視頻遊戲等其他藝術形式對於塑造人類文化和日常生活的影響力日益增加。本課程旨在藉由觀看電影、電視等其他形式的流行文化，來探索東西方流行文化在過去及現代的本質與意義。
description.en: Alternative forms of art – movies, television, comic books, video games – have become increasingly influential in shaping our culture and our daily lives. By watching films, televisions, and other forms of pop culture, this class explores the nature and significance of pop culture in the past, modern time of the West and East.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

name.en: The Principle and Practice of Display Technologies

description.zh: 1. FPD技術背景簡介 2.FPD製程原理 3. 偏極化: Jones 矩陣 4. 液晶顯示器的Jones矩陣模型 5.主動式液晶顯示面板設計初步
description.en: 1. FPD General 2. Vacuum and Vacuum System 3. Kinetic Theory of Gas4. Physical Vapor Deposition 5. Light-Solid Interaction6. AMLCD: Polarization 7. AMLCD: Panel Design

notes: 光電四、光電所和產業接軌合開【停開】

name.zh: 高功率光纖雷射科技與應用
name.en: High-Power fiber laser technology and application

description.zh: 此課程乃銜接雷射工程一課，進一步探討現今高功率光纖雷射系統之原理，工程技術與相關工業應用。主要涵蓋內容如下：1.雷射原理回顧2.光纖光學3.增益光纖與高功率元件4.高功率光纖雷射系統5.Q開關光纖雷射系統6.鎖模光纖雷射系統7.光纖雷射放大器系統8.光纖雷射加工應用9.光纖耦合之半導體雷射加工應用
description.en: It is the follow-up course of laser engineering. It further discusses the principles, engineering techniques and related industrial applications of advanced high-power fiber laser systems. The main contents are listed below:1. Overview of laser basic theory2. Fiber optics3. Rare-earth doped gain fiber and fiber based high-power devices4. High-power fiber laser systems5. Q-switched fiber laser systems6. Mode-locked fiber laser systems7. Fiber laser MOPA8. Fiber laser sources in micro-machining9. Fiber pigtailed diode laser in industry applications

name.zh: 就業達人講座-職場溝通實務

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「就業達人講座-職場溝通實務」之課程，藉由口說測驗相關教材以訓練學生語言表達能力以滿足未來就業市場對外語能力要求日高的需求，進一步提升學生的就業率。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance student’s oral language proficiency to satisfy higher and higher standard of foreign language requirement for the job market in the near future by applying those materials in Speaking Test.

description.zh: 不同文化之間的對話需要故事的講述。了解一種文化的故事有助於人們了解這種文化並與其人民交談。有時，一種文化會借用另一種文化的故事，或者寫一個關於彼此文化碰撞的故事。(例如，關於亞洲的美國故事，或關於美國的亞洲故事)。為了幫助學生與來自其他文化的人們談論重要的思想，本課程研究跨文化共享故事以及一種文化講述其他文化的故事。
description.en: Conversation between different cultures requires the description of stories.  Knowing a culture’s stories helps one to understand that culture and talk with its people. Sometimes a culture borrows a story from another culture or writes a story about its encounter with that other culture.  (For example, American stories about Asia or Asian stories about America).  To help students talk about important ideas with people from other cultures, this course examines stories shared across cultures and stories one culture tells about another.

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理3.電子擾繞射理論4.電子繞射圖行及缺陷分析方法5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2.The electron Microscope3.Scanning Electron Microscopy(SEM)　(1)Electron beam-specimen interaction　(2)Image formation in the SEM4.Transmission Electron Microscopy(TEM)　(1)Diffraction Theory  (2)Contrast Theory5.Specimen Preparation

name.en: Special Topics in Molecular Cell Biology

description.zh: 本課程討論細胞培養與基因工程技術之原理與應用，課程內容包涵下列主題：(1) 微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之特性 (2)細胞於生物反應器的培養，包括各式生物反應器介紹、生物反應器動力學、生物反應器之操作與控制 (3)基因重組蛋白之表現，將包涵不同的細胞載体表現系統 (4)實例探討，如單株抗體、生物高分子材料、基因治療載体等之生產。
description.en: This course discusses the principle and applications of cell culture and molecular biology.  The course covers the following topics: (1) characteristics of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells; (2) cell culture in bioreactors, including descriptions of bioreactor types, operation modes, bioreactor kinetics, and instrumentation and control; (3) expression of foreign genes in various cell systems; (4) case studies, such as production of monoclonal antibody, biopolymers, and gene therapy vectors.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

notes: ◎博班必修,碩班修不計畢業學分,老師行動不便請排四教

name.zh: 人機互動與產品設計研究專題
name.en: Human-Computer Interaction Design in Product Design

description.zh: 人機互動設計領域牽涉廣泛，於產品設計領域中亦有相當多應用於著墨，在本課程中將以實際案例以及產品設計進行深入研究與討論。
description.en: Human-Computer Interaction Design are included variable fields. There are also a lot of applications in product design field. This course gives an overview of how Interaction Design can lead to more product design possibilities by case studies and projects.

description.zh: 本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一)大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二)都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三)都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四)新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
description.en: There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken depend on when and how it is appropriate:(1) Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(2) Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(3) Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design (4) Exercise on urban design for new development area

name.zh: 積體電路製程先進技術與設備
name.en: Processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋半導體產業趨勢發展、超大型(Giga)半導體工廠廠務系統與先進自動化工廠運作、以及先進半導體製程技術和設備等三大部分。
description.en: This course mainly consists of development trend, Giga FAB, FAB automation, and processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing.

description.zh: 地下水為地球上可資利用且蘊藏最豐富之淡水資源，本課程以介紹地下水文相關理論及實務為主，有助於學生了解地下水之開發利用與經營管理。課程內容包括地下水之來源、流動及開發應用，以及各項天然或人為化學汙染對地下水系統質與量之影響評估 。
description.en: This course is concerned with the theory and practice of hydrology, the science of water in subsurface environments which are helpful for groundwater resource exploitation and management. It is divided into two main parts: (1) basic concepts dealing with the origin, movement of groundwater, and its recovery from wells, and (2) a qualitative and quantitative assessment of the chemistry of natural and contaminated systems.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

name.en: Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering Slope Stabilization

description.zh: 生態工法的概念和原則近年來廣泛地引介和應用在各種的土木工程領域中，包括河溪、坡地、都市和交通建設等，而由於土石流和坡地災害的頻繁發生，因此在山坡地應用生態工法遂成為重要的課題，也逐漸成為應該提供給土木系學生，使其瞭解相關基礎知識的重要課程，因此在本導論課程中，我們將介紹如何將生物地工技術和土壤生物工程（Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering）應用在邊坡穩定和侵蝕控制上，使學生認識並瞭解目前在邊坡保護上結合工程力學分析、植物學知識和實際案例應用的發展，並藉此介紹國內外常用的邊坡穩定工法，以及結合不同傳統擋土設施的可行方式。本課程無先修課程限制，建議研究所和大學部高年級同學選修。
description.en: The concept and principles of ecological engineering has been widely adopted by various disciplines of traditional civil engineering,including hydraulic engineering, slope stabilization, urban infrastructures, and transportation engineering.  Among them, slope stabilization is a particularly important topic because of thefrequent occurrence of debris flows and landslides in Taiwan, and thus it becomes necessary to provide such a course to familiarize students with this important field.  In this introductory course, we will explain the fundamental concepts of biotechnical and soil bioengineering and how to apply them to the slope stabilization anderosion control.  An interdisciplinary approach that combines the knowledge and understanding of both mechanical design and vegetation properties will be emphasized.  The results can be integrated with traditional retaining structures to create more economical and eco-friendly slope stabilization systems.  No prerequisite.

description.zh: 本課程是較大學部的「岩石力學」課程為之深入探討岩石行為的課程，將針對岩石的指數性質、透水性、強度及變形性做更詳細的研究，並將比較岩石和土壤的不同，以及介紹機率概念在岩石力學上的應用。上課時將以研究論文為主，，書籍、報告為輔，其涵蓋的課程內容大致如下：1、岩石的指數性質2、岩石和土壤的不同3、岩體分類法4、岩石的透水性5、立體投影圖6、岩石的強度7、岩石的破壤準則8、岩石的變形性9、弱面的分析10、機率在岩石力學上的應用
description.en: Compared to the undergraduate Rock Mechanics course, this is a more advanced course to examine the behaviors of rocks under different stress conditions。 It will focus on the index properties, the permeability properties, the strength properties, and the deformation properties of rocks。 In addition, it will address the difference between rocks and soils by contrast。 Finally, this course will introduce students to the concept of probability, and how it can be applied to the Rock Mechanics。 The students taking this course will have plenty of reading assignments, and are required to participate in the classroom discussions。

name.en: Special Topics on Geographical Information System

description.zh: 政府近年積極推動行政資訊化，應用資訊技術提昇行政的效率與品質，以達到便民及創新的效益。地理資訊系統(Geographical Information System，簡稱GIs)之開發與應用，即是提供各使用單位在處理大量圖籍與相關文字資料之管理與查詢的最佳解決方案；配合完整中文介面與印表技術，更可提高效率資訊服務。國內各重大工程在規劃設計時，正逐漸引用地理資訊系統。以其強大之資訊處理、整合、分析、及展示等功能輔助，如圖籍疊合與環框分析等，使工程規劃設計更為準確客觀，發揮工程最大效益。
description.en: To provide public service with better quality, the administration of government with information-based is widely established by adopting newly developed information technology.  Geographic Information System is one of the technology especially applicable when massive maps and attribute data are involved in management affairs.  It offers users a solution for information management and data query under a graphic environment with Chinese interface as well as output printing specification.  The planning and design of major construction projects in Taiwan were increasingly referred to GIS for the reason that efficiency can be maximized by the powerful data organization, integration, and display capability along with GIS.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

description.zh: N
description.en: N

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (III)

description.zh: 本課程以我國智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為教材，介紹電腦軟體、醫藥、生物、中草藥之專利申請審查，以及新型專利形式審查和舉發審查。
description.en: The textbook of this course is "Patent Examination Guidelines" which is issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office. We will introduce the examination practice for special patent cases, such as computer software, medicine, biology, and Chinese herbal medicine. In addition, the examination of utility model patent and patent invalidation will also be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生學習如何做財務投資決策，使得商業或工業的投資專案得到最大投資效益或最經濟的成本，課程主題包含：投資環境的定義、投資專案評估方法、利率及通膨率、資產折舊、所得稅、專案現金流量分析、專案投資風險與不確定性、實質選擇權、商業及工業投資案例研討。本課程中將考量專案投資分析的各種影響因素，使得決策者可以更有效地做出投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course is to teach students how to make smart financial decisions in an effort to create economical products. The subjects includes: the investment environment, investment project evaluation, interest rate and inflation rate, depreciation, income taxes, developing project cash flows, uncertainty and risk, real options, special topics of business and engineering decision. Various factors that affect the investment project decision problems are discussed to help decision maker properly resolves investment decision.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹軟性計算的概念、特性與優點，旨在提供學生多種不同的技術解決相關問題。課程目標有二：(1) 相關軟性計算技術，包含：關聯分析、群聚分析、分類等；(2)相關軟性計算技術應用，包含：時間序列分析、M-V Model、商業資料分析與組合管理等。
description.en: In this course, concepts, properties advantages of soft computing are introduced for providing various ways for students to solve problems. The goals of this course include two parts: (1) related soft computing techniques, including association analysis, clustering, classification, etc; (2) related soft computing applications, including time series analysis, mean-variance model, business data analysis and portfolio management, etc.

description.zh: 本課程銜接上學期程式交易課程內容(限定修過上學期的同學才能選修)，我們將使用R語言進行更為精實的交易策略建構，包刮K棒分析、指標建構、訊號探勘、資金管理…等。此外，我們下半學期將邀請業師教授XQ程式交易軟體，撰寫XS程式語法進行回測以及模擬下單
description.en: This course connects with the last semester courses “program trading” (limited to last semester students to join). We will use the R language for more sophisticated trading strategy construction, including K-bar analysis, index construction, trading signal exploration, money management, and so on. In addition, we will invite the instructor to teach XQ program trading software in the last half-semester, usingXS program grammar to back-testing trading strategies.

notes: 資財四甲和資財所合開

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解通路策略之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路策略的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路策略的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程、通路行為與通路策略等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in Channels Strategy. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making Channel Strategic decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations. The topics have function and flow of channel, channel behavior, and channel strategy.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹奈米結構材料之合成及其製程技術。內容大綱包括三部分：第一、奈米材料基本物理與化學特性，第二、奈米粉末和薄膜結構材料之化學合成，物理合成製程原理與特性，奈米塊體材料的性能與製備，第三、奈米結構材料應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first four chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of nanostructured Material. The next two chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the synthesis, processing and fabrication of nanostructured materials. The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹各種光學方法，用以量測位移及角度之變化，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號，以便進行分析。其內容含 :            ．簡介                ．雙頻干涉儀        ．幾何誤差            ．光學尺        ．幾何光學法          ．雷射光學尺        ．干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target . Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves :               ．Introduction            ．Optical Heterodyne Interfeometer        ．Geometrical Error       ．Optical Encoder         ．Geometrical  Methods   ．Laser Encoder        ．Interferometers

description.zh: 本課程為行銷在企業經營所扮演的策略性角色，課程設計以管理理論來探討行銷策略與企業併購的重要議題。課程內容包含行銷概念、行銷環境、行銷策略、競爭策略、併購策略、談判策略。身為企業經營者，面對國際化與多變化的行銷環境中，可以做出最佳的管理決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of marketing as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, organizations, business. The topics covered in this class include: The concept of marketing, marketing environment, marketing strategy, marketing competition, merger & acqusition( M&A) Strategy, negotiation strategy. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best manage decisions under the internationalized and changeable marketing environment.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1)領導的基本概念；(2)中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3)領導的案例研究；(4)領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

notes: (群組2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

name.zh: 全球組織經營策略暨領導決策
name.en: Global Organization's Management Strategies and Leadership Decision

description.zh: 本課程專注在探討全球組織經營策略與領導決策之關鍵議題，聚焦在不同時空的國際經營環境中，企業經營者如何因應政府的政策與財經情勢改變，能夠快速回應與彈性應變的領導思維與決策。透過本課程將能夠理解高階主管面對政經環境的調整能有效因應變化，並且提升領導才能與創造市場優勢之創新能力。
description.en: The course focuses investigate the global organization's management strategies and leadership decision of the key issues. It is focusing in the different time frames and fierce international environment, how changes in policy of governments and situation of economic. Business executives will be able to quick to respond with the elastic strain of the global strategy perspective and leadership thinking. This course will be able to understand top managers can achieve the decision making of leadership, and improve the leadership knowledge and innovation capabilities in market competition.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了(但不限於)人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

notes: (群組2)組織領導與人力資源管理

name.zh: 經營模式與智慧化企業

description.zh: 由於產業環境辦化及科技創新速度，影響企業之營運模式。本課程旨在針對因應產業/工業4.0調整，課中會針對企業經營模式變革與產業/工業4.0產業生態鏈變革探討。 除了理論解析外，本課程並輔以企業實務個案研討。
description.en: Due to the change of industry environment and the speed of technological innovation, the business models of enterprise are impacted. The purpose of this course will study the transform of business model and the impact of Industry 4.0 on the ecosystem of industry. In the course, besides the theory will be included, the business practices case will be also covered.

notes: (群組5)創新與創業管理, 新聘陳國樑

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以R語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

notes: 北科附工302室/(群組1)經營與策略管理

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以R語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

notes: 北科附工304室/(群組6)財金管理

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

notes: 北科附工304室/(群組7)資訊管理

name.zh: 智慧機器人與AR/VR 應用專題
name.en: Special Topics in Intelligent Robot and AR/VR Applications

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹智慧機器人及AR/VR之知識領域相關議題，關於智慧機器人部分，主要包括：機器人學原理與分析方法、機器人的設計分析製造與應用、智慧機器人的歷史與未來的發展、機器視覺之原理與應用等；關於AR/VR部分，此概論課程將介紹AR/VR相關技術於現今智慧製造與服務業之應用，並展示AR/VR於不同工作環境設計之應用實例，如VR/AR軟硬體操作及體驗、各式追蹤系統介紹等等。
description.en: This is an introduction course of intelligent robot and applications of augmented reality and virtual reality. The course is designed to provide the followings topics: 1. fundamentals of robotics and analytical methodologies, 2. design, manufacturing, and applications of robots, 3. the history and the future of intelligent robot, 4. fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision, 5. overview about AR and VR technology applied in smart manufacturing and service industries, 6. applications and examples of AR/VR, e.g. software and hardware design and operation, various tracking systems, etc.

notes: 北科附工302室/(群組3)工業與科技管理

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.電磁波在介質中的傳導 2.光纖光學 3.光纖種類及特性 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.光纖通訊系統 8.光纖網路
description.en: 1.Electromagnetic ware propagation in media 2.Fiber optics 3.Characteristics of optic fibers 4.Optical emitter 5. Optical receiver 6.Repeater and optical amplifier 7.Optical fiber communication 8.Optical fiber network

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 瞭解CMOS 超大型積體電路之電路元件特性及其組合電路之分析與設計方法，其內容包含：金氧半電晶體電路特性分析、電路性能評估、電路模擬、組合電路設計、序向電路設計、設計方法分析、測試與驗證、CMOS案例討論與Verilog HDL設計等課程內容。
description.en: This course covers the electric specification, circuit analyses, and design methods of the CMOS VLSI. The contents of this course include: Circuit characterization, performance estimation, Circuit simulation, Combinational circuit, Sequential circuit, Design methodology, Testing and verification, CMOS case study, and Verilog HDL design.

name.zh: 企業個案分析研討與寫作

description.zh: 本課程運用哈佛個案和加拿大Ivey 個案來說明企業管理的理論觀念以及分析方法,讓學生對企業管理有一定程度的了解,課程內容將以國外著名案例為基礎，主題包括(但不局限於): 財務管理、策略管理、創新管理、組織領導、行銷管理等。課程採用個案教學方法。
description.en: This course uses Ivey/Harvard case studies to enhance IMBA students' business concepts and theories. In addition, this course is also to teach the case writing skills. The case topics are: financial management, strategic management, marketing management, innovations…ect.

description.zh: 隨著新冠肺炎的疫情，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，經營數位行銷的需求，已經是每個公司所必需的。從新產品的開發、行銷、到售後服務均受影響。網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷實體通路以外的一個新興通路。使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流。因此，如何經營數位行銷已是現代企業具有競爭力重要課題。這個課程幫助企業在充分瞭解顧客信息的基礎上，針對客戶喜好，針對性地進行產品行銷，幫助企事業單位在激烈的市場競爭中取得競爭優勢。
description.en: Digital marketing is the conducting of business on the internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. This course will introduce the digital marketing by the way of concept, theory and case study. This course will study how to develope the business on the internet.

name.zh: 企業數位轉型與優化研討
name.en: Seminar on Enterprise digital transformation and optimization

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，數位轉型是項關鍵議題。本課程將使EMBA學生了解數位轉型與優化相關趨勢，並透過一些成功案例探討數位轉型對企業產生之效益，希望透過本課程之研討，EMBA學生可以將成功案例經驗及所學應用至所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, enterprise digital transformation is an important topic. The aim of this course is to comprehend the latest digital transformation issues and potential benefits to enterprise. Case studies and experience sharing are critical in this course.

description.zh: 1.	建立企業經營管理的基本認知2.	企業管理的經營模式認知3.	導入運用的方法與案例4.	提升學生經營管理能力
description.en: 1.	Establish basic understanding of business management2.	Cognition of business model of enterprise management3.	Methods and cases of introduction and application4.	Improve students' management ability

notes: (群組1)經營與策略管理(聯輔會)

name.zh: 企業精實與全球品質管理
name.en: A Lean and Mean Business and Global Quality Management

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程將使學員熟習各項品質管理的理論基礎與發展趨勢，強化理論研究與實務應用能力。首先，課程涵蓋基礎統計使學員具備研究方法與分析技術能力，了解收集、統整和分析資料。其次，討論量化的六標準差管理相關工具及專案推行流程，以系統化思維探討問題並提出有效可行的解決對策，持續提升品質及客戶滿意。最後，介紹制度面及組織管理面的全球品管概念，闡述創造魅力品質之重要理論模型及影響服務品質關鍵因素。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This class will help students familiarize themselves with the trend of theoretical basis of the quality management and strengthen their ability in both theoretical research and practical application. First, the course covers basic statistics so that students will be acquainted with research methods and analysis techniques. Second, the six sigma management tools will be reviewed and the process for its implementation will also be addressed. Finally, the system- and the organization-level quality as well as the Kano Model for attractive quality will be discussed.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

description.zh: 本課程教授人工智慧技術的基礎理論與實務技巧，並對於人工智慧在製造業、服務業、金融業的應用，提供啟發性的基本認知與創意，以激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括: 人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、工業 4.0、人工智慧的製造業應用個案、人工智慧的服務業應用個案、人工智慧的金融應用個案。
description.en: This course aims to teach students the basic concepts and practical techniques of artificial intelligence and to introduce its applications on manufacturing, service, and finance industries. The course focuses on inspring students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industry 4.0, real case applications on manufacturing, service, finance industries.

notes: 北科附工304室/(群組3)工業與科技管理

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

notes: 限10人/大研合開/創創總整課程

description.zh: 資訊安全以全面觀點說明執行完整的資訊與通訊安全管理所需考量的各個層面，課程包括：資訊安全管理國際標準、資訊安全政策與組織、人力資源安全、資產管理、存取控制、密碼學與金鑰管理、實體與環境安全、作業與通訊管理 系統獲取、開發及維護、供應商管理、資訊安全事故管理、營運持續管理之資訊安全層面、制度及法規的遵循
description.en: Information Security provides a comprehensive view of information and communication security. This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.

notes: 北科附工302室/(群組7)資訊管理

name.en: Science Technology Innovation And Foresight Thinking

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model andrelated theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

description.zh: 本課程探討的主題包括：電子商務的定義與架構、市場商機分析與風險評估、電子商務的經營模式及其對傳統經營模式造成的衝擊、顧客界面規劃設計、網路行銷與品牌塑造、實作導入、線上交易機制與資訊安全以及電子商務發展趨勢等相關議題，作深入淺出的探討。並以案例研討方式，加強學生理解，以達到最佳的學習效果。
description.en: This course mainly includes the following topics: 1.Overview of EC; 2.The opportunity and risk evaluation; 3.The business models of EC and impact on traditional businesses. 4. User interface planning; 5.The marketing strategies of EC; 6.How to install an EC; 7.Online transaction mechanisms and information security etc. Some real-world cases will also be discussed to enhance students' understanding and obtain the best learning effects.

description.zh: 此課程屬於高等無機化學特論，針對研究所學生有志於從事應用研究或投入化學工業而開設，有機金屬不只是化學家重要的研究工具也是化學工程師在設計反應的利器。課程內容包括:主族有機金屬、過渡元素之有機金屬化合物、硼族有機金屬、銅銀金之有機金屬、18價電子原理、s, p受體予體、有機錫
description.en: The advanced course for inorganic chemistry is designed for graduates who plan to initiate their academic research in the chemical field or work in chemical plants. Organometallics provides not only the powerful tools for chemist in their research but also for chemical engineers in the design of their reactors.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Main-group organometallics (2) Organometallic compounds of the transition elements (3) Organometallics of the boron group (4) Organometallics of Copper, Silver and Gold (5) The 18-Valence-Electron (18-VE) Rule (6) s, p donors and acceptors (7) Organotin

description.zh: 隨著高齡化社會的來臨與國家對於身心障礙者生活福祉的重視，輔助科技相關資源與人才需求日益倍增，各類輔具產品使用已成為這些族群在醫療照護上與生活品質提升上不可或缺的一環。本門課程為「生醫輔助科技跨域微學程」之入門基礎課程，建立學生對輔助科技有基本的通盤認識，期許未來具備相關能力投入輔助創新產品研發。若未來有志投入輔助科技相關產業工作，建議微學程可由此門課程開始選修。由於輔助科技涵蓋醫學與工程相關領域專業知識技術的整合，故由本校與臺北醫學大學攜手合作，兩校多位教師一同共授，提供兩校各20位學生選修，以促進學生或教師間的交流合作，本課程上課地點除了在本校，將有部分週次於北醫校園上課。
description.en: With the advent of aging society and the country's emphasis on the well-being of people with physical and mental disabilities, the demand of assistive technology resources and manpower is getting increased. The use of various assistive products has become an indispensable part for these people in medical care and quality of life. Assistive technology covers and integrates expertise in medicine and engineering related fields. The aims of this course are to let students have the comprehensive understanding of the current status and future trends of assistive technology. This course is the basic course for the “Assistive Technology Interdisciplinary Program”. If students consider to involve assistive technology-related industries in the future, we encourage students to enroll this course.

notes: 前9週至北醫上課，後9週北科上課，限10人，大研合開

description.zh: 邀聘專家開設就業模擬課程模組，演繹各行業職人百態，以職場實例進行雙向互動，讓同學增進肢體及口語表達能力，並建立正確的工作態度和職場EQ。
description.en: Outstanding industrial professional is invited to organize the career simulation program, where scenarios are designed for students to tackle the issues that are possibly faced in the future career. Proper attitude and interpersonal skills at work and be built up through the diversity of themes and scenarios, such as team building, communication and collaboration, and leadership enhancing. The body language and the communicative skills of the students are also strengthened through the programs.

description.zh: 本次更利用業界常用之光學模擬軟體RSoft以及COMSOL進行光學元件與系統設計，主要探討近代光學之應用，如光通訊，光敏材料和奈米光學結構等主題進行設計與討論。課程最後使用專題來檢驗學生學習成果，可探討題目有一維光子晶體：薄膜干涉、抗反射膜設計，二維/三維光子晶體，微結構之穿透反射頻譜、能隙分布（BandGap）計算，Meta-materials：微結構天線、光學抗反射結構（隱形斗篷），基礎波動光學：雙狹縫干涉、單狹縫繞射、散射（Rayleigh Scattering、Mie Scattering）等。
description.en: The used tool for this class is RSoft and COMSOL, common-used optical simulation software in industries. Students should present their work through final project presentations to examine their learning outcomes. The topics for final project include one-dimensional photonic crystals: thin film interference, anti-reflection film design, 2D/3D photonic crystals, transmission spectrum of microstructure, Bandgap calculation , Meta-materials: Micro-structured antennas, optical anti-reflective structures (invisible cloaks), basic wave optics: double-slit interferences, single-slit diffraction, and scattering (Rayleigh Scattering, Mie Scattering).

description.zh: 本課程重點在使博士班學生確實瞭解科學研究本質、量化研究方法、研究論文題目選擇、衡量程序與工具、文獻探討、問卷設計、資料收集與分析、論文撰寫方法，且在進行管理諮詢，如何選用合宜研究方法，並取得正確資訊，使目的完成。
description.en: The Special Topics in Research Methodology for Ph.D. students, includes the following topics: The nature of Science Research, Quantative Research Methods? And the research topic selection, literature survey, methodology and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 本門課主要內容分為兩部分。第一部分內容為機率統計的基礎原理、隨機訊號的介紹、相關函數及頻譜的分析、以及單自由度及多自由度系統的頻譜分析理論推導與範例應用。第二部分內容則為結構系統識別技巧的原理介紹與實際範例應用。安排每周進度時，將適度融合第一部分跟第二部分的內容進行介紹，並多以土木建築相關範例做練習。
description.en: The subject is designed to include two professional realms – spectral analysis and system identification. Regarding the learning of spectral analysis, the fundamentals of statistics, the introduction of random signals, correlation functions, spectral density functions, and theoretical derivation spectral analysis for SDOF and MDOF systems will be introduced. The training of system identification skills is also given, followed by commonly seen civil engineering examples.

description.zh: C語言為開發作業系統、嵌入式系統、通訊協定等程式最常使用的程式語言，本課程主要教導C程式語言於實務上之應用，課程內容主要包括：進階指標使用、指標與陣列、指標與資料結構、Pointer-to-pointer、指標函式、Callback function、Bitwise operation應用等，除了於PC上撰寫程式練習之外，亦會有case study來輔助教學以及了解C語言的使用技巧，期末亦會要求學生利用所學習到之技巧來模擬CPU排程與記憶體管理等相關作業系統底層程式。
description.en: The C programming language is commonly used to implement operation systems, embedded systems, and communication protocols. The object of this course is to teach how to apply the C programming language to develop real application systems. The contents of this course include advanced pointer usage, pointer and array, pointer and data structure, pointer-to-pointer, function pointer, callback functions, bitwise operations, and so on. In addition to practice on PC, this course also offers case studies for better understanding. Students will also be required to implement emulators to simulate OS lower level operations, e.g., CPU scheduling and memory management.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。

Implantables include sutures, vascular grafts, artificial heart, artificial bones and ligaments, drug delivery device, artificial tissues, artificial liver,etc. Nonimplantable materials are : cloths in medical uses,  surgical dressings and gauze, injection device, diagonsis materials, etc. Extracorporeal materials are : dialysis fibers, artificial lung, catheters, etc.
